text_block_list.text: One sunday, I decided to have a stroll around the academy…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hmhmhm!? Hold up a moment there, good citizen! You are bathed in a most peculiar aura!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I see in your future… a leisurely afternoon outing with me! 
Oh how thoughtful, how wonderful～!
choice_data_list: Uhh, I just remembered I had work to do…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Naaaaah!? Don't be like that, Trainer! I beg you, at least hear me out first～!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Since I am unburdened by classes or training today, 
I wanted to spend my time relaxing downtown.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No sooner had I thought of this than I received 
a great shock from my early morning milk divination! 
My day's fortune was to be… Terrible!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Not wanting to see my one free day go up in smoke, 
there was only one conclusion I could come to.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, I would have to surround myself with powerful 
sources of fortune. I've already stuffed lucky items in 
any place that will hold them!
choice_data_list: And I'm one of those sources…?
And I'm one of your lucky items…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
My divination further said that individuals who have aided me 
in the past would invite positivity and fortune upon me～! 
Hence I beg of you, I beeeg of you to come with meee～!!

There wasn't much I could do when she clung to me begging 
and teary-eyed like that, so I accompanied her downtown.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
We must certainly try the candy shop first! 
It will be the perfect opportunity to divine your fortune!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Try buying the kind where you can get a winner. 
We'll be much the wiser on matters of luck that way!
I bought some chewing gum that fit the bill…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Oooooh, you actually got a winner immediately!? 
Clearly you're having Great Luck today!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
My turn now… With all the lucky items I carry with me, 
perhaps I can overturn this morning's milk divination!

All fired up, Matikanefukukitaru picked a piece 
of gum and started unwrapping it ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: The paper is blank… I shall take this as Middling Luck!
choice_data_list: Isn't that a bit convenient of a choice?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It is completely fine. Today's world is all about convenience. 
Come, let us be on to our next destination.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
The odds & ends boutique! 
We can find ourselves a lucky item or two here.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Ooooh, I have spotted a rare trinket already! Those daruma dolls have both eyes drawn in, would you believe!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
One is not supposed to draw in both of these eyes until 
the wish made to it comes true, but these ones started 
out with their purpose already achieved…!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, I'll take three of these! One will be for keeping, 
another for my personal shrine, and the last to get someone 
else started with the wonders of divination.

We had a fun time wandering around. 
Some time later ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Where better to wrap up today than at the shrine! 
I offer my gratitude for this day of peace and tranquility.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Truly, divination and auspicious traditions are such 
wonderful things. They've always been there for me, 
always pushed me forward. Ever since that day…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Indeed I did! I was still very young when I came to trust 
in divination. Even back then, I liked to run and race…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But I had the pace of a snail, and never the courage to join 
the sprints on sports days. Until one day, I had a dream…

text_block_list.name: Divine Shiraoki
text_block_list.text:
Fukukitaru. Hear me, Fukukitaru. Enter the sprint. 
Enter, and you are certain to receive the gold medal.

text_block_list.name: Young Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Whehh, really?! But who are you…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That was my first time meeting Divine Shiraoki… 
and indeed, I scored first place without issue!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ever since, I never fail to engage in divination and prayer 
to my lucky items before every challenge.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
If you ask me, lucky items are the trail left by fortune itself! 
The very horseshoe prints of success!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Without them, I would be only a horsegirl standing 
in a gate… unable to even get myself moving.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
That's why I can't bring myself to throw them away. 
I feel like I would regress back to how I was before, 
without anything to hold on to…

There could be no doubt about how much divination 
and those lucky items helped support her, and how 
much they meant to her.

Nonetheless, her overdependence on these things leading 
her to shut down when they are not available is worrying.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hm? What do you have in mind?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hm-hmm… so all I have to do is play this claw machine, is that right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I'll snag something up in no time! Observe the power 
of my pockets packed with lucky items!
choice_data_list: Hand me all your lucky items first.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Neeehh!? What kind of outrageous request is that!? Snagging anything from a claw machine without lucky items is not an accomplishable feat!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Moreover, my luck for today is Terrible… 
Forget snagging anything, I fear my whole 
wallet would not even get that claw moving!
choice_data_list: <size=34>We'll just call an employee over if that happens.</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Noooooo～! Don't be so unreasonableeee～!

Plenty of shrieking later, I had managed to 
convince her to hand in all her lucky items.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Gu-huh… At this point I am nothing more than pure, concentrated misfortune……
choice_data_list: Come on, give it a go.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
This endeavor is futile… there are no traces of fortune 
left in me. Goodbye, blessings. Goodbye, optimism……

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
But you are my lucky person, Trainer, so please at least 
stay close to me if you want me to try this～

Determined to ignore her pleas, I took a step back and watched 
as she started an attempt at the claw machine ——

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Well, there you have it. Or more accurately, there you don't. 
It's no surprise, now that none of the lucky items' power 
is supporting me…

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hehh…? Can I do so? A-Alrighty then…
I had her try a number of times, until eventually ——
(Clunk!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Huh? I… got one…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: I got one out of it, Trainer!
choice_data_list: See, you can do it without lucky items!
See, you can do it without lucky items!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
It certainly looks that way… So what you're saying is that 
fortune can reach me even in the absence of lucky items…?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Hwaaah～ It's… actually really freeing to know that I don't have to lug a mountain of lucky items with me everywhere.
choice_data_list: <size=38>Relying on your charms too much isn't good.</size>
<size=38>Relying on your charms too much isn't good.</size>

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
I understand now! Perhaps I was indeed a little too fearful. 
From now on, I think I will carry only a choice few with me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Weeell～ Today turned out to be an extremely 
auspicious day worth remembering. I feel like 
it could be a turning point for me, in fact.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
And there can be no mistaking this plush! It will be a truly 
worthy addition to my collection of lucky items!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: …… Ah, but I was going to cut down on lucky items. Wuehehe… Then I'll gift it to a nice kid around here.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Between those I currently own and you being by my side, 
I have more than enough already! Even if I let go of a few, 
my wishes are as good as fulfilled!

Matikanefukukitaru looked content. It seems like I was 
able to help her take a more positive outlook.
